Literature.Title: Toward the Synthesis and Improved Biopotential of an N-methylated Analog of a Proline-Rich Cyclic Tetrapeptide from Marine Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Dahiya R, Kumar S, Khokra SL, Gupta SV, Sutariya VB, Bhatia D, Sharma A, Singh S, Maharaj S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=6µg/ml),Microsporum audouinii(MIC=6µg/ml),Aspergillus niger(no activity data),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=6µg/ml),Megascolex konkanensis(LD=2000µg/ml),Pontoscolex corethrurus(LD=2000µg/ml),Eudrilus eugeniae(LD=2000µg/ml)
